texts.biography: Polestar was raised on the Deyjan plain among the nests of the flying Brain Suckers. Her ability to tame these creatures became desirable in the army of King Kastore.
texts.name: Polestar

specialty.name: Brain Suckers
specialty.description:
{Brain Suckers and Soul Suckers}

Increases Speed of any Brain Suckers or Soul Suckers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 4 levels (rounded up).
